http://example.org/HammerToFallSegment.Answer: Queen performed a six-song medley at Live Aid including Bohemian Rhapsody, Radio Ga Ga, Hammer to Fall, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, We Will Rock You, and We Are the Champions.

http://example.org/HammerToFallSegment.CQ_Text: Which [Artist] song was the third in their [Event] setlist in [Year]?
http://example.org/HammerToFallSegment.Answer: “Hammer to Fall” was the third song in Queen’s six-song setlist at Live Aid 1985, and it was a staple of their Works and Magic tours.

http://example.org/HammerToFallSegment.CQ_Text: What visual moment involving [Performer] occurred during their performance of [Song]?
